mapper.insert: insert into tb_paper (tp_id, tp_type_id, tp_num_id, tp_info, tp_weight, tp_del, tp_created_date, tp_updated_date) values (#{tpId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tpTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tpNumId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tpInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tpWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tpDel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tpCreatedDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{tpUpdatedDate,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update tb_paper set tp_type_id = #{tpTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tp_num_id = #{tpNumId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tp_info = #{tpInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tp_weight = #{tpWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tp_del = #{tpDel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tp_created_date = #{tpCreatedDate,jdbcType=DATE}, tp_updated_date = #{tpUpdatedDate,jdbcType=DATE} where tp_id = #{tpId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select tp_id, tp_type_id, tp_num_id, tp_info, tp_weight, tp_del, tp_created_date, tp_updated_date from tb_paper where tp_id = #{tpId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select tp_id, tp_type_id, tp_num_id, tp_info, tp_weight, tp_del, tp_created_date, tp_updated_date from tb_paper
